text: The 1988 Algerian Cup Final was the 26th final of the Algerian Cup. The final took place on June 23, 1988, at Stade 5 Juillet 1962 in Algiers. USK Alger beat CR Belcourt 5-4 on penalties to win their second Algerian Cup. ==Pre- match== ===Details=== {| style="width:92%;" |- | | |} {| width="100%" |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK|| 1 || Yacine Bentalaa |- |RB|| 2 || M'hamed Soumatia |- |LB|| 4 || Farid Bengana |- |CB|| ' || Redouane Bellemou |- |CB|| 3 || Rabah Kourifa |- |MF|| 6 || Farid Mouaci |- |MF|| 7 || Amirouche Lalili |- |MF|| ' || Fawzi Benkhalidi || |- |MF|| ' || Athmane Nourine |- |MF|| 10 || Salim Boutamine || || |- |FW|| 11 || Tarek Hadj Adlane |- |colspan=3|Substitutes : |- |FW||8|| Boualem Baaziz || || |- | ||'|| Samir Keddou |- | ||'|| Samir Osmane |- | ||'|| Réda Saadedine |- |colspan=3|Manager : |- |colspan=4| Djamel Keddou |} |valign="top"| |valign="top" width="50%"| {| style="font-size: 90%" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0" align="center" |colspan="4"| |- !width="25"| !!width="25"| !!width="200"| !! |- |GK|| ' || Djamel Boudjelti |- |DF|| ' || A.
